title: [Health] Consuming a high number (>7 servings/ day) of refined grains, such as croissants, white bread, pasta/noodles, or breakfast cereals, is associated with a higher risk of heart disease (33%), stroke (47%) and death (27%). (BMJ, n=137,130 in 21 countries)
[Health] Preschoolers with higher cardiorespiratory fitness do better on cognitive tests
